descriptionHtml:
Dragonsmount Redone is a medium sized walled home that's adequate but not over the top. No Frills, with everything you need.
I expanded on Maxrsp's original layout by adding a walled courtyard, sparring yard, stable, and watchtowers. 

[u][b]PROGRESS[/b][/u] --12/13/2014-- (Check here regularly to see what i'm working on): Hey guys! finals are over and i'm working full tilt on interior renovations! expect an update soon!



Here's wishing every one a happy holidays! Cheers!
 
- Outlander 




[u]home currently includes:[/u]

*Storage and Display, situated at the front of the keep for convenience.
*Sleeping quarters
*Kitchen/Dining 
*Office
*All crafting stations

[u]planned renovations are:[/u]

*Full Library
*Study/Office
*Bathroom
*Apothecary
*Mages Loft
 
in addition to tweaks to existing interiors.

Compatibility/REQ: 

This File should not require any DLC to function properly, and shouldn't conflict with any mods, besides any that edit the same cells.

[u][b]If you have any issues or suggestions let me know![/b][/u]


[u]Thanks again to MAXRSP for the original structure and interior cells![/u]
If you are looking for something similar with but less "fortress-y" you can check out his original here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49074/?
author: OutlanderREN

files.name: DragonsMount Redone 0.7
files.changelogHtml:
*crafting area in its final form
*added more lighting to courtyard
*Smelter and chopping block moved to courtyard
*added Well to couryard
*all exteriors 100% complete.
